alert.note: Alert for Riverside; San Bernardino (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued October 15 at 5:17PM PDT until October 15 at 8:15PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 716 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Southwest California, including the following counties, Riverside and San Bernardino. * WHEN...Until 716 PM PDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 517 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms over the Apple and El Dorado burn scars. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Apple and El Dorado burn scars, Yucaipa, Forest Falls, Mount San Gorgonio, Hwy 38 Between Yucaipa And Onyx Summit, Mountain Home Village, Angelus Oaks, Barton Flats Campground, Cherry Valley and Morongo Indian Reservation. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
